body:
@Hoodiebud 

Whining and getting mad about porn brings you roughly on the same level as incels.

This doujinshi deserves to burn in hell and never exist. It should break the laws of thermodynamics and disappear from existence. The artist(s) are a disgrace to society and needs to be outcasted to live in the middle of nowhere. These people have lost all their humanity. All forms of empathy, love and compassion is gone and replaced with disgusting hate, extreme degeneracy beyond comprehension and not contributing to society or anyone at all. No one needs them, and it should stay like that. It's mind boggling how hard it is for people to just draw more normal shit, and if you can't get satisfied with that, you've gone off the deep end and need some serious therapy, or else you will slide down a dangerous slippery slope of degeneracy.
@Eisenbison Sooo he's an incel. Got it. What a loser.

Wow, this modaetei guy hates women. And I don't just mean that anyone who draws or makes porn hates women, buy the way he treats women in his comics, he literally hates them and wants to watch them suffer on a psychological, personal level.
